title: Launcher issue
body:
Basically for both PBE and Normal client launchers I'm having an issue where the client patches fine and does everything ok, but when I click the launch, sometimes it will process and the login screen comes up, but ~70% of the time it doesn't do anything, but still shows within task manager, it's like it's failing to launch but doesn't realise it.
I then forcibly close and reopen it and cross fingers again.

Anyone know any solutions to this rather annoying problem?

replies.body: If you're not receiving any errors but stalling after tapping Launch, then there may be some security setting preventing the client from opening.  To find out for sure, I suggest using the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to fix this up.  Let me know if that helps!

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=1Qe51Fc4,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-10-20T18:33:05.936+0000)
>
> If you're not receiving any errors but stalling after tapping Launch, then there may be some security setting preventing the client from opening.  To find out for sure, I suggest using the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to fix this up.  Let me know if that helps!

Hi Porocles,

Thanks for the swift response. I'm not convinced it's security related, as the issue is persistent, but intermittent. It will pop up around 1/20 times, if security I would have expected 0% entry rate?
That aside tried steps 1->4 with no success, is there anything else that could be recommended before reinstallation?
Note that the same error occurs with accessing PBE server through that client also.

Many thanks,


EDIT: 7 attempts to log on waiting ~30s per time and 8th time works almost instantly after clicking launch. I really do not know what causes this problem, it is definitely an error my end? If I must reinstall I have no guarantee of fixing and ~3hours of reinstallation (the client is not install-friendly..)

Yup, even if it's intermittent there may be some setting or software (like anti-virus) that may be getting in the way.  You can also download our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to help with firewall settings just in case, and it also has a refresh so you don't have to go through a whole reinstall.  If the issue persists, hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so our tech team can help.  The HRT should provide some logs that you can attach to your ticket for context.

Thank you, I'll try those steps and see how it goes, next step is support ticket so /end thread but help much appreciated.
Have a nice weekend :)
